# chemdiv

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

chemdiv is an in development R package to analyse phytochemical data


## Installation

The developmental version of the package can be installed directly from GitHub
using the `install_github` function from the devtools package.

```{r, eval = FALSE}
# Install devtools if not already installed
install.packages("devtools")

library("devtools")

install_github("hpetren/chemdiv")
```
